message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I know we both want to maximize our gains.
I understand you want a fair split Alice, but the decreasing value over time hurts me more. How about this offer?
Bob, time is running out and hurting you more than me. I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
